title: Should You Start Destiny in 2022? - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Learn more about the NZXT Canvas Gaming Monitors at http://nzxt.co/KINDAFUNNY

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Andy and Joey have fallen in love with Destiny 2, but does that mean you should? Blessing and Greg talk to them about their return/debut and why they're obsessed! Plus, Bless talks Inscryption!
